sentences: Lapsed said kõrini mängimisest ja tahavad kohe puhata.
Ta sai kõrini sellest piinlikkusest ja lahkus ruumist.
context: The Estonian word 'kõrini' is an adverb that expresses the feeling of being annoyed, fed up, or tired of something. It indicates a state where someone has had enough of a situation and wants it to stop. This word is commonly used in everyday language when expressing frustration with ongoing situations, repetitive behaviors, or excessive amounts of something.
